y = datajuvintnap['xGPer90']
labels=["Juventus","Inter","Napoli"]
myexplode = [0.1, 0.1, 0.1]

plt.title("Juventus-Inter ve Napoli Ortalama Gol Beklentisi", fontsize = 14,color='black');
plt.pie(y,labels=labels,explode=myexplode,shadow=True)
plt.show()
source.5ded9420:
Squad : Teams


NPL : Number of Players


Poss : Possession


Touches : Touches


DefPen-Touch : Defensive Penalty Touches


Def3rd-Touch : Defensive 3rd Touches


Mid3rd-Touch : Middle 3rd Touches


Att3rd-Touch : Attacking 3rd Touches


AttPen-Touch : Attacking Penalty Touches


LiveBall-Touch : 


Drib-Succ : Dribble Success


Drib-Att : Dribble Attempted


Drib-Succ% : Dribble Success Rate


Carries : Total Carries


TotDist-Carr : Total Distance Carries


PrgDist-Carr : Progressive Distance Carries


Prog-Carr : Progressive Carries


1/3 : Progressive Carries in Attacking 3rd Area
